page.title: 03Carnival Time.
page.content:
If you go to Keynsham at Carnival time (June) you will see a parade of floats. The floats are open lorries which are decorated and the people are dressed up. Our float was about the "Yellow Submarine"(the title of a song). Alisson and I were mermaids. We set off and waved to all the people. I saw my mother and my brother but they were on the opposite side of the road to me. Soon it was over and so we got off at Cadbury's ground. There was a fair with roundabouts, swings, candy- floss stalls, cake stalls, places to win things and a bouncy castle. I saw the Wurzels sing, lots of old cars and parachutists jumping out of an aero- plane. Then we walked home.
(Anna, Maria and Lucy, aged 8.)
